entity

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • entity.Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Player

    public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the parent to Player, Enemy, and AdvancedEnemy. This class holds methods and variables for position, direction, health, speed, width and height
    Author:
    Trevor Aquino
